sobremi.h2: I like to make things simple, optimal and functional.
sobremi.p: I work mainly in front-end but also back-end development, with a commercial focus.

imanes_tucuman.desc: Site for a commercial venture selling magnets

catalog.desc: Diseño web para catálogos estáticos de negocios

web.label: Web design
text_content: A website is a great way to showcase content and reach your audience. It creates a more focused online presence, making it easier for search engines to link users to your content. It also gives a more professional and trustworthy image

listas.label: Price
items: Additional if you need anything else from the +Plus list
Advance of $10,000 and cancellation upon completion

catalogo.label: Online Catalog
text_content: If you're looking for something less complicated than an online store, and a website is too much, an online catalog is a simple and quick option for showcasing products and services
This makes it easier for customers to understand what you offer and find what they want if you have a wide variety of items; in addition to being listed on search engines

listas.label: Basic
items: WhatsApp Link to Complete the Sale

listas.label: What do you need?
items: Fill out an Excel spreadsheet with the item information
A folder with the item images
Business information: name, address, networks, hours, etc.
Wait 1 to 3 days to set up the catalog

listas.label: Price
items: Advance of $5,000 and cancellation upon completion
Additional if you need anything else from the +Plus list

tienda.label: Online Store
text_content: If you want a retail website that you can manage and control, it's best to use an existing service that only involves customizing and uploading items (Empretienda, Tienda Nube, Mercado Shops, Woo Commerce, etc.)

Unlike a website from scratch, this saves you the cost of website structure, database design, personal server costs, and more; and unlike an online catalog, here you can manage the content directly. Additionally, the services usually include a payment system, ordering, history, etc

listas.label: What do you need?
items: Item details: name, price, category, etc.
Business details: name, address, networks, hours, etc.
Please allow 1 to 5 days for page setup

listas.label: Price
items: Advance of $10,000 and cancellation upon completion
Additional if you need anything else from the +Plus list
Please note that stores have a separate monthly fee

catalogo_pdf.label: PDF Catalog
text_content: A quick and affordable way to showcase a sample of what's on offer with a text-based search system

listas.label: Basic
items: Up to 120 articles by filling out an Excel spreadsheet

listas.label: +Plus
items: Additional Pages (clarifications, terms and conditions, FAQs, etc.)

listas.label: What do you need?
items: Item details or fill out an Excel spreadsheet
Business details: name, address, networks, hours, etc.
Allow 1 to 3 days to design the catalog

listas.label: Price
items: Advance of $5,000 and cancellation upon completion
Additional if you need anything else from the +Plus list
